events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on March 30, 2024, with significant front-end damage to their car.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords related to the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specialized in auto accident claims was assigned to handle this particular case to ensure proper follow-up.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps in the process.
Requested the driver’s license, vehicle registration, accident police report, and photos of the damaged car from the claimant.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of vehicle damage and official accident report from the police.
Investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted documents and scheduling interviews with involved parties and witnesses.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault and all damages to the vehicle are covered under the policy.
Proposed a settlement amount to the customer covering all repair costs and associated expenses related to the auto accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the quick resolution and clarity of the settlement proposal, appreciating the support throughout.
The claim was approved following customer acceptance of the settlement offer, ready for payment processing.
Full settlement payment was issued to the customer’s bank account to cover vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The auto accident claim file was officially closed after confirming payment receipt and follow-up satisfaction from the customer.
